Align the LinkedIn headline and summary with the clear, professional branding established on GitHub (e.g., 'Backend Developer | Go & TypeScript').
Showcase key GitHub projects in the 'Featured' section of the LinkedIn profile to provide direct evidence of skills.
On GitHub, ensure the top 4-6 repositories are pinned to the profile and have comprehensive README files with setup instructions and usage examples.

final_assessment.rationale: The candidate demonstrates exceptional backend skills (Node.js, MongoDB) and expert-level version control with Git, making them a very strong technical fit for the backend aspects of the role. However, there are two major concerns: a complete lack of experience with the required frontend framework, Angular, and an inability to verify their professional and educational background due to an inaccessible LinkedIn profile. An interview is recommended to assess their aptitude and willingness to learn Angular rapidly and to confirm their eligibility for the position.
